settings.ggM52_fCdiE_text: Experience your perfect Paris wedding or elopement—without any planning stress.

settings.ggObwB5SISc_text: "Our Paris wedding was more than I could have ever imagined. It was fun, romantic, spine-tingling, beautiful and just dreamy."
settings.ggZLafnZDvn_text: And the organization was superb and ran like clockwork. We have memories that will last forever.

settings.ggDIE3ASemI_text: That daydream you have about eloping or having an intimate wedding in Paris?
settings.gg6b9dNL3ta_text:
To get married in Paris is to celebrate your love in one of the most romantic and beautiful places in the world. But planning a wedding from overseas can feel overwhelming when you don’t know the city, the best vendors or speak French.

Our all-inclusive Paris wedding package, with its stress-free planning experience, means you and your partner will arrive ready and relaxed to enjoy your day.

settings.gg3lwGnJvYv_text: All-inclusive, customisable wedding packages & vow renewals in Paris
settings.ggMBea-zSeb_text:
Perfect for couples seeking to elope or experience 
an intimate wedding ceremony with less than 15 guests.
settings.gggNk7hMEQD_text:
Professional Photographer + 2-hour photo tour
Personal wedding planner
Outdoor symbolic wedding ceremony
English-speaking officiant
Luxury car and chauffeur
Bride’s hair and make-up
Wedding bouquet and boutonniere
Commemorative certificate
Day-of coordinator (remote)
Restaurant reservation
settings.ggMC2htiR9o_label: OUI! WE WANT TO GET MARRIED IN PARIS

settings.ggr3V0sd1NL_text: Enjoy the flexibility to make your wedding day truly yours...
settings.ggF43pgWLJN_text: Our wedding package provides everything you need for a perfect day but you can still personalize it to suit your style. Enjoy choosing from a range of add-ons and upgrades from videography, beauty, luxury cars, live music, indoor venues, flowers and wedding cakes.

settings.ggFCGn8CIlZ_text: MEET YOUR PERFECT PARIS WEDDING TEAM
settings.ggfI4ZI42Ga_text:
We’re wedding planners, officiants, photographers, chauffeurs, florists, hairdressers, make-up artists, videographers and musicians with years of industry experience and an intimate, locals knowledge of Paris.

 

We’re fueled by good coffee and a shared passion for helping couples like you have an unforgettable and unique wedding day in our beloved city, Paris.

settings.ggHt3GfzjaY_text: "My husband and I had the best day of our lives on our wedding day. The entire planning process from the beginning was easy and Claire was a pleasure to deal with.."
settings.ggQOOLqkC1v_text: "Claire found us an intimate spot for our ceremony overlooking the Eiffel Tower. We felt like we’d known Claire and Julien, the photographer, for years. We had lots of laughs and a few tears (happy ones). The photo shoot was amazing, like a private tour of Paris. We had the most magical day.”
